alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 2:01AM MST until November 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THURSDAY TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 PM Thursday to 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
